description:
The maximum size of video-clip files supported in a Pro account is 200MB and that in Premium is 75MB.


A video file of format .mp4, .avi and .vlc is supported by this application.
description_text: The maximum size of video-clip files supported in a Pro account is 200MB and that in Premium is 75MB.     A video file of format .mp4, .avi and .vlc is supported by this application.
title: What is the valid file size and format of video-clip files supported by this application?
